mapper.insert: insert into stock_in (in_id, in_no, part_id, warehouse, in_type, quantity, unit_price, total_amount, supplier, batch_no, in_date, operator, related_order, created_time, remarks ) values (#{inId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relatedOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update stock_in set in_no = #{inNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_id = #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_type = #{inType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=DATE}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, related_order = #{relatedOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where in_id = #{inId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select in_id, in_no, part_id, warehouse, in_type, quantity, unit_price, total_amount, supplier, batch_no, in_date, operator, related_order, created_time, remarks from stock_in where in_id = #{inId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
